timeline.message:
Update tool.sh for 1.10.x

Modify the regex to successfully determine zookeeper version in the tool.sh script.

Update regex pattern in tool.sh

Modify the regex in tool.sh to successfully determine zookeeper version. Previous commit needed to be slightly modified to work correctly. Replacing ^3[.][01234].*$ with .*-3[.][01234].*$

timeline.bodyText:
How about this?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            if [[ $ZOOKEEPER_VERSION =~ .*-3[.][01234].*$ ]]; then
          
          
            
            if [[ $ZOOKEEPER_VERSION =~ ^.*zookeeper-3[.][01234].*$ ]]; then
timeline.author: ctubbsii
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ fi
 
 ZOOKEEPER_CMD='ls -1 $ZOOKEEPER_HOME/lib/zookeeper-[0-9]*[^csn].jar '
 ZOOKEEPER_VERSION=$(find -L "$ZOOKEEPER_HOME" -maxdepth 2 -name "zookeeper-[0-9]*.jar" | head -1)
-if [[ $ZOOKEEPER_VERSION =~ ^3[.][01234].*$ ]]; then
+if [[ $ZOOKEEPER_VERSION =~ .*-3[.][01234].*$ ]]; then

timeline.message:
Update assemble/bin/tool.sh

Modify the regex in tool.sh to successfully determine zookeeper version. Previous commit needed to be slightly modified to work correctly.

Co-authored-by: Christopher Tubbs <ctubbsii@apache.org>
